thread.title: CBB's Jamie O'Hara SLAMS Danielle Lloyd's £15,000 a month maintenance
thread.title_full: CBB's Jamie O'Hara SLAMS Danielle Lloyd's £15,000 a month maintenance

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: CBB's Jamie O'Hara SLAMS Danielle Lloyd's £15,000 a month maintenance
text:
CBB's Jamie O'Hara SLAMS Danielle Lloyd's £15,000 a month maintenance The footballer appeared to throw serious shade at his ex-wife while talking about his finances Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jamie O'Hara slams ex-wife Danielle Lloyd Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celebrity Big Brother's Jamie O'Hara isn't doing too well on the not mentioning Danielle Lloyd front – he's already been moaning about the amount he has to pay her in child maintenance. 
Opening up about his finances to fellow housemates Nicola McLean and Bianca Gascoigne , footballer Jamie, 30, said problems about money started while he and Danielle were still married. 
"Obviously when I was with Danielle I was earning really good money. So she was kind of expecting that to continue," he said. Read More Jamie O'Hara claims ex-wife Danielle Lloyd was demanding - days after revealing he wasn't allowed to mention her in CBB Jamie O'Hara talks to Bianca Gascoigne about his financial arrangements with ex-wife Danielle Lloyd (Photo: Channel 5) 
"I was like, you've got to understand I'm not in that life anymore. I'm not on that money and I don't want those things. I can't afford the things we used to have." 
Bianca spoke up, saying she knew he'd do everything in his power to keep his children – Archie, six; Harry, five, and George, two – happy. 
"I'd give my kids my last penny, and it hurts me, because I'm like, 'f g hell, I'm paying out," Jamie went on. Read More Jasmine Waltz has Celebrity Big Brother 2017's first kiss - but is it with Calum Best or Jamie O'Hara? He reveals the situation is "f
